creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
kyo_ka:Wondering how Mt. Fuji is thinking of the people who are coming and going along the foot of herself all the time.
Ikii suru hito no iku tabi nagametewa nan to omoinu Fuji wa yoshiwara
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi 東海道五十三次), also known as the Kyōka Tōkaidō
title: View of Mt. Fuji on Left Seen From the Street  in Yoshiwara
